name: Neon
description: Neon's MCP server acts as a bridge between natural language requests and the Neon API, translating requests into necessary API calls to create projects, branches, run queries, and perform migrations with ease.

name: Stripe
description: Execute Stripe API calls and access up-to-date Stripe knowledge to build your integration.

name: filesystem
description: Node.js server implementing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for filesystem operations.

description: MCP server for Brave Search API integration
